import React, { Component } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import previous from "./Icones_Arigoni/previous.svg"; import "./Facture.css"; import Acompte from "./acompte"; import FormulaireAvoirs from "./formulaireavoir"; class EditAction extends Component { state = { num_commande: "", num_confirmation_commande: "", num_document_transport: "", num_facture: "", date_facture: "", montant_ht: "", montant_ttc: "", echeance_facture: "", taux_applicable: "", intérets_capitalises: "", active: true }; handleMyUserInputs = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; render() { return (
this.props.pageChangeSub("Actions")} >
